transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%

SKT_FIRST.name: Whatever!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to grant the caster increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000055_1]</color> chance to grant the caster increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000055_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: To the Beach?
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: When using this skill, <color=#28d9ed>removes all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> on the target and attacks the enemy. If the caster is granted increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color>, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>. This attack bypasses the target's Resilience.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage (Additional increase against Earth enemies)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nResets Gone Surfing! cooldown

description: When using this skill, <color=#28d9ed>removes all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> on the target and attacks the enemy. If the caster is granted increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color>, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000055_2_1]</color>. This attack bypasses the target's Resilience.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Gone Surfing!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Increases damage dealt to enemies with <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>.\nWhen the enemy has no <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> or is defeated after this skill is used, grants an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color>.\nThis skill deals increased damage to Earth bosses.
description: Attacks an enemy. Increases damage dealt to enemies with <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>.\nWhen the enemy has no <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> or is defeated after this skill is used, grants an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color>.\nThis skill deals increased damage to Earth bosses.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000055_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000055_backup_1_1]</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000055_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
